message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG

Reasoning: 
- cs.RO (Robotics): The paper focuses on generating co-speech gestures for humanoid robots, which falls under the domain of robotics.
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper uses natural language processing techniques to understand speech text and generate corresponding gestures, which falls under the domain of computation and language.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper deals with generating visual gestures, which falls under the domain of computer vision and pattern recognition.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper uses an end-to-end neural network model for gesture generation, which falls under the domain of artificial intelligence.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper uses a learning-based approach for gesture generation, which falls under the domain of machine learning.
